h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Cat Eye Beads Location
content: You need to defeat the Wandering Wight before ringing all three bells in Black Wind Mountain and killing Elder Jinchi. This secret boss in the Ancient Guanyin Temple will despawn the Wandering Wight, making the Beads unobtainable. You can also grab the Wandering Wight Spirit here too upon defeating him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Cat_Eye_Beads.md', within the main section titled 'Cat Eye Beads', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Cat Eye Beads Location'.
The content is as follows:
You need to defeat the Wandering Wight before ringing all three bells in Black Wind Mountain and killing Elder Jinchi. This secret boss in the Ancient Guanyin Temple will despawn the Wandering Wight, making the Beads unobtainable. You can also grab the Wandering Wight Spirit here too upon defeating him.
